message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.RO

This paper is about evolving local learning rules for artificial neural networks (ANNs) to enable autonomous learning under changing environmental conditions. The paper focuses on the plasticity property of biological neural networks and employs genetic algorithms to evolve Hebbian-based local learning rules. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category for this paper is cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Additionally, the paper involves machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, which makes cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) likely sub-categories as well. The paper also deals with self-organization and adaptation, which are relevant to the sub-categories cs.SY (Systems and Control) and cs.RO (Robotics).
